metadata.title: CVE-2024-4771 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A memory allocation check was missing which would lead to a use-after-freeif the allocation failed. This could have triggered a crash or potentiallybe leveraged to achieve code execution. This vulnerability affects Firefox< 126.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
